data.name: RPG Maker MV - Add-on Vol.1: RM2k Rearrange Soundtrack & SE
data.detailed_description:
The product name Season Pass Vol.1 has been changed to Add-on Vol.1.
NOTE: The contents included will not change.

Take a step back into the past, as you listen to the classic musical masterpieces from RPG Maker 2000.

Expertly arranged and re-mastered, RM2k Rearrange DLC contains your favorite music tracks and sound effects. Inspired by classic JRPGs, this audio pack includes the basics for creating that perfect game. Whether you're looking for that nostalgic, familiar feeling or are in the market for something new, RM2k Rearrange DLC is your go-to pack!

This pack contains:
- 10 expertly re-mastered BGM (music theme) tracks
- 100 brand new SE (sound effects)

NOTE: This product is included in the RPG Maker MV - Add-on Pack.

data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Japanese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024x768 desktop resolution or higher
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
